channel.title: NPC Drops (Help Me?)
channel.description: I need some help adding NPC drops. (I have no idea how its done) I am running a Delta-Source. Please help :)

item.description:
@blacksabath wrote:

is that normal to be in your npcdrops.java cause my npc drops are bugged like if i put d claws at 10% for a drop u get it like so easy or if i put it at 30% its like every drop how do i fix this

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops (Help Me?)
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

Uhmm yeah. This is all thats in my NPCDrops.java

public class NPCDrops {
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];
public int npcId;

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
	npcId = _npcId;
	for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
		Items[i] = -1;
		ItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
}

}

Read full topic
